description: Drew Peters, Tony Zerega & Peter Wilder. It's a life essence of its own - this sex drive. And all you can do is drown in it, escape into it, and sink in the pleasures of the moment, overwhelmed by the maddening, explosive and satisfying thrill of it all. From a hungry cock-sucking boy by the pool to the splash of a garden hose buried deep in his ass.  Soak it in, man, it's worth the ride!
title: Soaked
